pet.name: Snowy Fangorn Huorn
pet.description: Summons a snowy Fangorn Huorn to brighten your day.
pet.sourceDescription: Available in West Fangorn by barter or chance!

pet.description: Summons a Fangorn Huorn to brighten your day.
pet.sourceDescription: Available in West Fangorn by barter or chance!

pet.description: Summons a dusty shrew to brighten your day.

pet.name: Black Swan
pet.description: Summons a black swan to brighten your day.
pet.sourceDescription: Available in West Gondor by barter.

pet.name: Little Tundra Cub
pet.description: Summons a little tundra cub to brighten your day.
pet.sourceDescription: Available from participating in community events.

pet.name: Spirit Bear
pet.description: Summons a spirit bear to brighten your day and be unsettling.
pet.sourceDescription: Available from participating in community events.

pet.name: Night Swan
pet.description: Summons a night swan to brighten your day.
pet.sourceDescription: Available in the LOTRO Store.

pet.name: Treasure-seeking Cave-claw
pet.description: Summons a treasure-seeking cave-claw to help you search for riches!
pet.sourceDescription: Available in the Treasure Hunt Event by barter.

pet.description: Summons a pink-beak cave-claw to help you search for riches!
pet.sourceDescription: Available in the Treasure Hunt Event by barter.

pet.name: Copper-back Frog
pet.description: Summons a copper-back frog to keep you company.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in Eastern Gondor.

pet.name: Fog Frog
pet.description: Summons a fog frog to help keep you company.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in Eastern Gondor.

pet.name: Marsh Frog
pet.description: Summons a marsh frog to keep you company.
pet.sourceDescription: Available from a Warband in the Dead Marshes.

pet.name: Frog
pet.description: Summons a frog to keep you company.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in Eastern Gondor.

pet.name: Pond Frog
pet.description: Summons a pond frog to keep you company.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter from Roving Threats.

pet.name: Well-travelled Turtle
pet.description: Summons a well-travelled turtle to your side. It has seen far more of Middle-earth than you would expect of a turtle. Now it travels with you!
pet.sourceDescription: Available from a Warband in the Dead Marshes.

pet.name: Grim
pet.description: Summons a grim to your side. A jacket is recommended.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in the Yule Festival.

pet.name: Fire Grim
pet.description: Summons a fire grim to your side. It is fun at parties.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in the Yule Festival.

pet.name: Shadow Grim
pet.description: Summons a shadow grim to your side. It is helpful during bright days.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in the Yule Festival.

pet.name: Sand-flies
pet.description: Summons some sand-flies to your side. They have taken an interest in you.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in Ringló Vale. Requires Kindred Standing with the Men of Ringló Vale.

pet.name: Stowaway Rat
pet.description: Summons a stowaway rat to your side. It once lived on a Corsair ship, but now prefers travelling with you!
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in Lebennin. Requires Kindred Standing with the Men of Lebennin.

pet.name: Aurochs Calf
pet.description: Summons an aurochs calf to your side. It wants to see the world past Ringló Vale.
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in Dor-en-Ernil. Requires Kindred Standing with the Men of Dor-en-Ernil.

pet.name: Brown Squirrel
pet.description: Summons a squirrel to keep you company.
pet.sourceDescription: Available from participating in the story of Bingo Boffin. May be bartered for in the Trollshaws.

pet.name: Farmer Maggot's Dog
pet.description: Though excellent at guarding crops, this fellow is not very good in true combat situations. Still, he provides pleasant company.
